channel.title: niggling main page issues
channel.description:
Just usability concerns tbh, not actual bugs.. but two things about the main page bother me:
1: The menu takes AGES to appear
2: Turning off sound doesn't turn off the menu sound.
It'd also be nice if the site could remember your preference for sound on/off, etc. :3

item.title: niggling main page issues
item.dc:creator: Xappy
item.description:
Just usability concerns tbh, not actual bugs… but two things about the main page bother me:

2: Turning off sound doesn’t turn off the menu sound.

It’d also be nice if the site could remember your preference for sound on/off, etc. :3
